trans-unit.source: This section describes the core <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> functionality. In addition, it details the most basic <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> deployment, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> embedded in a Java application.
